TargetName: DEL-01-03: Frontend Workspace Bootstrap & Packaging Baseline
Statement: DEL-01-01 requires the frontend/ workspace baseline (package manifest + build config + scaffolding) to exist before the desktop Electron + Next.js build can proceed. Without the frontend workspace there is no build target.
SourceRef: Scope Amendment A1 > Execution Gating Rule
EvidenceQuote: DEL-01-01 remains blocked until DEL-01-03 ... scaffolded and reach at least IN_PROGRESS
Notes: FACT. SCA-001 gating edge retained and now maturity-satisfied: DEL-01-03 is IN_PROGRESS. The desktop build (Electron + Next.js) requires the frontend workspace to contain the build target. SOW-044/SOW-047 cover the workspace baseline and packaging baseline that DEL-01-01 consumes.

TargetName: DEL-03-07: Harness API Baseline in Frontend Runtime
Statement: DEL-01-01 requires the harness API routes (session/turn) to be present in the frontend runtime for build verification to confirm the application functions (session boot + working root selection). Without the API baseline the built application cannot complete verification.
SourceRef: Scope Amendment A1 > Execution Gating Rule
EvidenceQuote: DEL-01-01 remains blocked until ... DEL-03-07 ... scaffolded and reach at least IN_PROGRESS
Notes: FACT. SCA-001 gating edge retained and now maturity-satisfied: DEL-03-07 is IN_PROGRESS. Build verification (Procedure Steps 3.1-3.2) requires harness API routes to exist for functional confirmation. SOW-045 covers the API route baseline that DEL-01-01 verification consumes.
